wikipedia_page.main: Ben Twell (30 August 1903 – 1986) was an English professional footballer who played as a forward. Most notably he was a forward for Southport, scoring a hat trick in three consecutive games. He scored 25 goals in 22 appearances there, before being transferred to New Brighton.

response: *Ben Twell (1903 – 1986), former player for Grassmoor Ivanhoe
